title: Celebratory Package
seo_title: Celebratory Package - Luxury Hotel Offers in NYC - WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: Whether you’re treating a special someone to a romantic getaway or enjoying a birthday fête, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00 PM is also included.
contents: Whether you’re treating a special someone to a romantic getaway or enjoying a birthday fête, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival.
